sentences.sContent: A juridical precedent is nothing but "authenticated custom".
sentences.sContent_eng: A juridical precedent is nothing but "authenticated custom".
sentences.sCn: 司法惯例只不过是“权威的惯例”罢了。

sentences.sContent: Yet each country has its own juridical protection system for such nonage criminals since they belong to a special group of legal person.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet each country has its own juridical protection system for such nonage criminals since they belong to a special group of legal person.
sentences.sCn: 未成年人属于特殊的法律主体，在处理未成年人违法犯罪问题时须依据司法保护制度进行。

sentences.sContent: These revolt methods bring the cost on the economy, juridical risk to them, also bring the risk of politics.
sentences.sContent_eng: These revolt methods bring the cost on the economy, juridical risk to them, also bring the risk of politics.
sentences.sCn: 农民的这些抗争方式既给他们带来经济上的代价、法律上的风险，同时也带来政治上的风险。

synos.tran: 司法的；法院的；裁判上的

remMethod.val: jurid (法律) + ical (…的) → 法律上的

words.tran: 管辖权的；司法的；司法权的；裁判权的
司法权，审判权，管辖权；权限，权力
法律体系；法学及其分支；法律知识；法院审判规程

trans.tranOther: relating to judges or the law
